intro.p: The county of Los Angeles wants to get an idea of how residents feel about the quality of the transportation option in the county. In order to get the information, the County Department of Transportation uses records of vehicle registered in the county from the Department of Motor Vehicles to randomly select 1,000 residents of the county to send them a questionnaire written in English, asking for them to reply to a variety of questions about the transportation option available in the county.

Survey respondents were asked to decide to what degree they agreed with the following statements. The possible answer were "Strongly Agree", "Agree", "Neither Agree or Disagree", "Disagree", "Strongly Disagree".

item.p: The county has done a wonderful job providing excellent transportation options to county residents.
There is sufficient parking in the county.

intro.p: {{sample}} residents responded to the survey. {{result_1}}% of respondents said that they {{agree_1}} that there are sufficient transportation options available and {{result_2}}% said that they {{agree_2}} that there is sufficient parking.
